org.pepstock.charba.client

Class AbstractChart.InternalInterationModeObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pepstock.charba.client.commons.NativeObjectContainer
      • org.pepstock.charba.client.AbstractChart.InternalInterationModeObject
  • Enclosing class:
    AbstractChart

    static final class AbstractChart.InternalInterationModeObject
extends NativeObjectContainer
    Internal native object container which is mapping the interaction options needed to invoke Chart.getElementsAtEventForMode(BaseNativeEvent, String, NativeObject, boolean).
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private static class  AbstractChart.InternalInterationModeObject.Property
      Name of properties of native object.

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      private InternalInterationModeObject(boolean intersect)
      Creates the object with a native object instance, setting the intersect passed as argument.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      (package private) InteractionAxis getAxis()
      Returns to 'x', 'y', or 'xy' to define which directions are used in calculating distances.
      (package private) boolean isIntersect()
      if true, the hover mode only applies when the mouse position intersects an item on the chart.
      private NativeObject nativeObject()
      Returns the native object instance.
      (package private) void setAxis(InteractionAxis axis)
      Sets to 'x', 'y', or 'xy' to define which directions are used in calculating distances.
      Defaults to 'x' for index mode and 'xy' in dataset and nearest modes.
      (package private) void setIntersect(boolean intersect)
      if true, the hover mode only applies when the mouse position intersects an item on the chart.
